GUI

Class CustomMaze

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.CustomMaze

  • public class CustomMaze
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for the creation of a custom Maze.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static boolean addDragon 
      protected static boolean addExit 
      protected static boolean addHero 
      protected static boolean addPath 
      protected static boolean addSword 
      protected static boolean addWall 
      protected static boolean alreadyAHero 
      protected static boolean alreadyAnExit 
      protected static boolean alreadyASword 
      protected static boolean editingMode 
      protected static int mazeSize 
      protected static boolean[][] visited

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomMaze() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addActor(int xMaze, int yMaze)
      Responsible for adding an actor to the Maze.
      static void addDragonMode()
      With the addDragon variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, a dragon will be added.
      static void addExitMode()
      With the addExit variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the Exit will be added.
      static void addHeroMode()
      With the addHero variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the hero will be added.
      static void addPathMode()
      With the addPath variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, an empty space will be added.
      static void addSwordMode()
      With the addSword variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the sword will be added.
      static void addWallMode()
      With the addWall variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, a wall will be added.
      static boolean checkCollision(int x, int y)
      Checks if there is already an hero, dragon or sword to prevent collision when adding a new actor.
      private static boolean checkForAllActors()
      Checks if all the actors are placed in the maze.
      private static boolean checkMaze(int x, int y)
      Checks if the hero can reach the exit, not counting with dragons using a backtracking algorithm.
      private static boolean checkViable()
      Checks if all the actors exist in the maze and if the maze is viable.
      private static void customGameVariables()
      Prepares the variables for a custom maze.
      static void customMazeSize()
      Creates a maze and fills it with walls.
      private static boolean dragonsExist()
      Checks if there is at least a dragon in the maze.
      private static boolean exitExists()
      Checks if there's already an exit in the maze.
      private static boolean heroExists()
      Checks if there is already a hero in the maze.
      static void initializeVisited()
      Initializes a matrix used for the backtracking algorithm.
      static void startCustomGame()
      Starts a custom game, first checking if the maze is viable.
      private static boolean swordExists()
      Checks if there's already a sword in the maze.

    • Method Detail

      • customMazeSize

        public static void customMazeSize()
        Creates a maze and fills it with walls.

      • customGameVariables

        private static void customGameVariables()
        Prepares the variables for a custom maze.

      • startCustomGame

        public static void startCustomGame()
        Starts a custom game, first checking if the maze is viable. If not presents a dialog.

      • checkViable

        private static boolean checkViable()
        Checks if all the actors exist in the maze and if the maze is viable.

      • initializeVisited

        public static void initializeVisited()
        Initializes a matrix used for the backtracking algorithm.

      • checkMaze

        private static boolean checkMaze(int x,
                int y)
        Checks if the hero can reach the exit, not counting with dragons using a backtracking algorithm.

      • checkForAllActors

        private static boolean checkForAllActors()
        Checks if all the actors are placed in the maze.

      • addActor

        public static void addActor(int xMaze,
            int yMaze)
        Responsible for adding an actor to the Maze. The player first selects which actor to add and clicks on a square.

      • checkCollision

        public static boolean checkCollision(int x,
                     int y)
        Checks if there is already an hero, dragon or sword to prevent collision when adding a new actor.

      • exitExists

        private static boolean exitExists()
        Checks if there's already an exit in the maze.

      • swordExists

        private static boolean swordExists()
        Checks if there's already a sword in the maze.

      • dragonsExist

        private static boolean dragonsExist()
        Checks if there is at least a dragon in the maze.

      • heroExists

        private static boolean heroExists()
        Checks if there is already a hero in the maze.

      • addDragonMode

        public static void addDragonMode()
        With the addDragon variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, a dragon will be added.

      • addPathMode

        public static void addPathMode()
        With the addPath variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, an empty space will be added.

      • addWallMode

        public static void addWallMode()
        With the addWall variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, a wall will be added.

      • addHeroMode

        public static void addHeroMode()
        With the addHero variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the hero will be added.

      • addSwordMode

        public static void addSwordMode()
        With the addSword variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the sword will be added.

      • addExitMode

        public static void addExitMode()
        With the addExit variable is true, when the player clicks on the Maze, the Exit will be added.
